page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: The main hamlets in this Domesday block are Stanway,Longville and East Wall.The South Shropshire District Council is not allowing infilling of {dwellings. }The only planning applications passed are for change of use of farm buildings for tourism or crafts or an occasional cottage needed for a worker.Thus the area has changed little over the years.The 2 principal houses are Wilderhope Manor and Stanway Manor,the former is now a youth hostel and the latter remains a private residence.There are 12{ {farmhouses }of considerable size,the majority of which were in existence before the 1841 tithe map.A number of old {stone cottages}have been extended to give extra living space and bathrooms.There were a few {council {houses }built in Longville in 1954.
